content.description: Stand start with hands on a sloper. Pull up and into the crack to work your way along. Make sure to use the giant ledge bellow you for your feet. When you get to the end of the crack find some good feet and toss for the big jug then top out.
content.location: Walk passed Smiley and Nose Picker up the path on the hill. About 40ft up the trail cut left and you will see a crack called Paula. Walk around the left side of the boulder and you will see a nice horizontal crack.

content.description: Squat start with hands crossed and good feet. Pull up to a good crimp with your left. Bring your right up to the crimp just under your left hand. Move your feet around and Reach up high for the good crack. Stand up high and top out.
content.protection: Pads and spotter. Be careful of barn dooring on this one because if someone fell they could go all the way down to Paula.
content.location: To the right of Paula up the hill from Smiley. The right of the two seams.

content.description: Sit in the hole match hands in the crack. Get the huge foot below you and a good smear. Smear your heart out and pull up to the good finger lock with your right. Once you get there grab the arete with your left and work your feet around. Get into a layback position to bring your right hand up high and bring your left foot up onto the arete. Rock over to your left and work up to the lip. Top out the climb.
content.location: Around the corner from Skate Shoes and uphill from Smiley.
